channel.title: [PI] Player Owned Shops [Small Problem]
channel.description: Hi, i've been developing a nice clean PI recently and ive hit a problem. Ive added player owned shops. ::Claim, Viewing shops etc works, however my problem is that i dont know how to add items to my shop? Surely there should be an npc i need to spawn? Please get back to me ASAP. thanks!

item.title: [PI] Player Owned Shops [Small Problem]
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“QuantomScape, post:2, topic:446421”]along the developement of the player owned shops, you should have made the command
::myshop

along with a way for other players to right click and view other players shops[/quote]

Yeah, figured it out. TYA

Read full topic

along the developement of the player owned shops, you should have made the command

Hi, i’ve been developing a nice clean PI recently and ive hit a problem. Ive added player owned shops. ::Claim, Viewing shops etc works, however my problem is that i dont know how to add items to my shop? Surely there should be an npc i need to spawn? Please get back to me ASAP. thanks!
